430340.name: RTK13 - Mitsuteru Yokoyama's “Sangokushi” tie-up Officer CG “Zhuge Liang” 横山光輝「三国志」タイアップ武将CG「諸葛亮」
430340.description:
Officer graphics based on the Zhuge Liang that appears in Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Zhuge Liang. The available face graphics will appear. Choose Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Sangokushi" Zhuge Liang Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
430340.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
